mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lostPet(lostPetNum, sort, subject, content, lostDate, addr, num, nickName, imageFileName, speciesSort) VALUES(LOSTPET_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sort}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{lostDate}, #{addr},#{num}, #{nickName}, #{imageFileName}, #{speciesSort})
mapper.select: SELECT lostPetNum, sort, subject, addr, imageFileName FROM lostPet OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
